item.description: Please bring a homemade/gourmet snack to share and it's recipe. All recipes contributed before Saturday 12AM, will be compiled and passed out at the meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: 300 Independence Drive Chestnut Hill, MA, Look for Signs posted on the doors.
item.why: We have 295 fantastic cooks as members, and we have yet to meet. Let's get to know each other over homemade/gourmet snacks, and play.
item.name: Meet, Nibble, and Play! Game Night
